column1: 8.1:You're on the phone with your girlfriend

41.1:She's cheer captain and I'm on the bleachers

74.2:I can't help thinkin' this is how it ought to be
85.1:And you've got a smile that could light up this whole town
89.2:I haven't seen it in a while since she brought you down

column2: I know you better than that
what you doin' with a girl like that?
